claim: Recombinant technology leads to a broader immune response that may provide cross-protection, even in a mismatch season.
explanation: The image displays the logos of the U.S. Department of Health & Human Services and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention on a black background. does not support the claim as the figure only contains organizational logos and provides no data or information on recombinant technology, immune response breadth, or cross-protection.

detailed_analysis.image_description: The image displays the logos of the U.S. Department of Health & Human Services and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention on a black background.
detailed_analysis.reasoning: does not support the claim as the figure only contains organizational logos and provides no data or information on recombinant technology, immune response breadth, or cross-protection.
